questions.question: The layered arrangement in sedimentary rocks is called?

explanations.b: Explanation : By stratification is understood a layered arrangement in sedimentary rock. This may be developed very prominently and can be seen from a distance of miles or in other cases may have to be ascertained after close examination of the rock

questions.question: The structure most prevalent to clastic rocks is

explanations.d: Explanation : The most prevalent structures of a clastic group of sedimentary rocks are the ones belonging to mechanical structure which are, stratification, lamination, cross beddings, rain prints etc

questions.question: Lamination is structure formed in which type of sedimentary rocks?

explanations.a: Explanation :Lamination is a characteristic structure of fine-grained sedimentary rocks like clays and shales.

questions.question: The process not contributing to clastic rocks is____

explanations.b: Explanation :The mechanically formed sedimentary rocks undergo processes like- weathering, erosion, transport, deposition and diagenesis. Oxidation is considered under to be a non-clastic cause.

questions.question: What is the size required for a particle to be called gravel?

explanations.c: Explanation :All sediments and clastic fragments of rocks above the size of 2 mm irrespective of their composition and shape are broadly termed as gravels.
